registry.EmailMessage

    • Uses of EmailMessage in data

      Methods in data that return types with arguments of type EmailMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<EmailMessage> CallListDataAccess.getEmailMessages(int clinicId, java.lang.String subject)
      This method uses the getEmailMessages procedure in the database to find and return the list of email messages to be sent to selected patients in the call list.

    • Uses of EmailMessage in utility

      Method parameters in utility with type arguments of type EmailMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean EmailUtility.sendBatchMail(java.util.ArrayList<Patient> emailPatients, java.lang.String from, java.util.ArrayList<EmailMessage> messages, boolean bodyIsHTML, java.lang.String emailPassword, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This method takes the given parameters and uses them to send a batch of email reminders to multiple patients from a host email account.
